Fun casual shooter game that's pretty easy to pick up and put down. You can pretty quickly get absorbed into the intricacies of each map and strategies, and it's one of the games where team work is truly rewarding and worthwhile.

It Is fun, although as a starting player, you can only really be okay at two game modes, casual (which doesn't make you improve) and Deathmatch which is okay if you only need to improve on aim and shit like that. If you play comp, you almost immedetly get kicked- fairly- but the training bots dont work and to find good aimbots and other things like that, you need to already know someone who has played.
